description: This table contains information on when standing/future orders are released to be performed.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the order

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of users who reviewed this order.

columns.name: RELEASE_ORD_DATE
columns.description: The dates on which instances of this order are to be released to the lab to be performed
